author: Hemsley + Hemsley
method: Blend all of the ingredients and 750ml/1 pint 6fl oz cold water together in a food processor until smooth. Add more water to loosen, if necessary. To serve, pour into small glasses.
ingredients: 1 small peeled ripe banana,chopped, frozen,  3 tbsp cacao powder,  2 tsp coconut oil,  1 ripe avocado,  1 tsp vanilla extract ,  1-2 tbsp honey, preferably raw honey, to taste,  tiny pinch salt
